content:
I am an undergraduate student major in Compuetr Science at and a member of ACM Honor Class, Zhiyuan College . ACM Honor Class is an elite CS program at SJTU for top 5% talented students.
Currently, I am having my internship in Social and Language Technologies (SALT) lab of Georgia Institute of Technology, supervised by Prof. Diyi Yang. I am currently working on the topic of Knowledge Graph Based Natrual Language Generation.
Before that, I had finished my intern in APEX Data & Knowledge Management Lab on topic of Data Mining and Dialogue Generation, supervised by Prof. Weinan Zhang and Prof. Yong Yu .
I am applying for a Master or Ph.D’s program in Fall 2021.
summary: I am an undergraduate student major in Compuetr Science at and a member of ACM Honor Class, Zhiyuan College . ACM Honor Class is an elite CS program at SJTU for top 5% talented students.
title: Wentao Zhang
